channel.title: [317] Please help with adding a platebody
channel.description: Hello everyone. I was really needing help adding a platebody that I made to my server and I don't know what to do about the anim on the rsdatmaker. When i try to add the anim to it, it only has stuff like Insert blanks, head object, gloves etc. but it doesn't have body as a selection. So I messed around and I finally got it to wear semi alright except when I wear it, it will push my head forward or sometimes move my body back from the legs. Can anyone help me please?

item.title: [317] Please help with adding a platebody
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

xneonx:

Hello everyone. I was really needing help adding a platebody that I made to my server and I don’t know what to do about the anim on the rsdatmaker. When i try to add the anim to it, it only has stuff like Insert blanks, head object, gloves etc. but it doesn’t have body as a selection. So I messed around and I finally got it to wear semi alright except when I wear it, it will push my head forward or sometimes move my body back from the legs. Can anyone help me please?

You have to manually animate it using priorities, Tskins, and vskins.

Read full topic

So I messed around and I finally got it to wear semi alright except when I wear it, it will push my head forward or sometimes move my body back from the legs. Can anyone help me please?
